title: Illuminating Shot

Illuminating Shot

Fire a shimmering bolt that inflicts 1 turn of Radiating Orb upon the target.

Illuminating Shot is a Weapon Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
